Exam sessions and other information**

You will see that no exam dates are available. This is because this second cycle degree programme is composed of learning activities belonging to different degree programmes. Therefore the automatic system showing dates is not able to upload all relevant dates.

[Reduce](https://corsi.unibo.it/2cycle/IntelligentEmbeddedSystems/exam-dates#)

To check the exams you can sit according to your study plan, consult specific information and register for a session, access [AlmaEsami](https://almaesami.unibo.it/almaesami/welcome.htm) or download [myUniBo](https://www.unibo.it/en/university/university-of-bologna-app/myunibo-app) app.

No exam dates available for the moment.
